entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of light snow later this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
